description: Number of sets of cycle graphs of 2n nodes where the 2-colored edges alternate colors.
comments: Also number of permutations in the symmetric group S_2n in which cycle lengths are even and greater than 2, cf. A130915. - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Aug 25 2007
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: If b(2n)=a(n) then e.g.f. of b is 1/(sqrt(exp(x^2)*(1-x^2))).a(n) = 4^n*(n-1)*gamma(n+1/2)^2*hypergeom([2-n],[3/2-n],-1/2)/(Pi*(n-1/2)). - _Mark van Hoeij_, May 13 2013a(n) ~ 2^(2*n+1) * n^(2*n) / exp(2*n+1/2). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Mar 29 2014
